item.title: Leveraging LLMs for Threat Modeling - GPT-3.5 vs Claude 2 vs GPT-4
item.description: In a bid to uncover which AI model is best at threat modeling, I put GPT-3.5, Claude 2, and GPT-4 to the test. Let’s see how they performed. Ethan Mollick, a professor at The Wharton School, once said something that perfectly captures my experience with these AI models. It feels as if they’re striving to answer questions in the simplest way possible üòè However, you can get around this by asking for detailed explanations or step-by-step thinking.
